ComicInfo.Summary:
Niander Wallace’s 'first angel' Luv - who hunts down Officer K in the Blade Runner 2049 movie - features in this new ongoing series!
It’s been three years since Niander Wallace launched his 'perfectly obedient' Replicants, and his assistant, Luv, became the first Replicant Blade Runner.
Now Cleo Selwyn has returned to L.A. searching for her Replicant mother Isobel whom she believes has been kidnapped by Niander Wallace. The only person who can help her is disgraced former Blade Runner Aahna 'Ash' Ashina.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 04:56:26. [CVDB959513]
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/blade-runner-2039-1/4000-959513/

ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Jackson Butch Guice,Jung-Geun Yoon,Patrick Strattner,Syd Mead,Veronica Fish
ComicInfo.Teams: Replicants,Los Angeles Police Department,Blade Runner Squad
